effect.x_y: Transfers the user’s held item to the target. If the user has no held item, or the target already has a held item, this move will fail.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Transfers the user’s held item to the target. If the user has no held item, or the target already has a held item, this move will fail.

short_effect.x_y: Gives the user’s held item to the target.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Gives the user’s held item to the target.

flavor_text.x_y: The user passes its held item to the target when the target isn’t holding an item.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user passes its held item to the target when the target isn’t holding an item.
